mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (room_id, sender_id, content, message_type) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{messageType})
mapper.select: SELECT m.message_id, m.room_id, m.sender_id, m.content, m.message_type, m.created_at, cu.user_name AS sender_name, fl.file_log_id, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM roomparticipant rp WHERE rp.room_id = m.room_id AND rp.left_at IS NULL AND rp.user_id != m.sender_id AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM messagereadreceipt mrr WHERE mrr.message_id = m.message_id AND mrr.user_id = rp.user_id ) ) AS unread_count FROM message m JOIN user cu ON m.sender_id = cu.user_id LEFT JOIN filelog fl ON m.message_id = fl.message_id WHERE m.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY m.message_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO messagereadreceipt (message_id, user_id, read_at) SELECT message_id, #{userId}, NOW() FROM message WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
INSERT IGNORE INTO messagereadreceipt (message_id, user_id, read_at) VALUES (#{messageId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT message_id FROM message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY message_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM roomparticipant WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND left_at IS NULL) - 1) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messagereadreceipt WHERE message_id = #{messageId}) AS unread_count
